extendedInfo.description: Please buy "Photo Gallery Lock Pro Key" for the pro version (All ads removed).Keep your photo & video in safe!A photo/video gallery 3d that hides your privacy pictures & videos with password! Do you have pictures or videos on your phone that you don't want others to see? Keep them in "Photo Gallery Lock"!IMPORTANT: how to use Photo Gallery Lock?â Add Media to Photo Gallery Lock   1. Open the image and video gallery on your phone;   2. Select one or more pictures or movies;   3. Open the âShareâ menu;   4. Select âGallery3Dâ;   5. Wait for the media to be moved (it make take a while if you have moving a lot of files or large movies);   6. DO NOT DELETE YOUR OWN PICTURES OR VIDEOS!  If they are still in your gallery then they were not moved to the Photo Gallery Lock.  Photo Gallery Lock will remove them from your gallery once they are completely transferred to the Photo Gallery Lock;â Remove Images/Videos From Photo Gallery Lock   1. Open Photo Gallery Lock;   2. Press and Hold on the image/video you would like to return to the original gallery;   3. Tap any other images/videos you would like to unvault to make them selected;   4. Press the âRemoveâ button at the bottom menu, select âUnvaultâ option;â Set up a password   1. Open Photo Gallery Lock;   2. Long click on âVaulted Mediaâ Album or press hardware menu two times, to make menu bar show up;   3. Press âmoreâ at bottom menu, then choose âPasscodeâ option;   4. Enter your new password in each of the text fields;   5. Press the âOKâ button;   6. Now Photo Gallery Lock will ask you for your password when you open it;â Change Password   1. Open Photo Gallery Lock;   2. Long click on âVaulted Mediaâ Album or press hardware menu two times, to make menu bar show up;   3. Press âmoreâ at bottom menu, then choose âChange passcodeâ option;   6. Type new passcode, and press the âOKâ button;   7. Now Photo Gallery Lock will require your new password when you open it;â Remove Password   1. Open Photo Gallery Lock;   2. Long click on âVaulted Mediaâ Album or press hardware menu two times, to make menu bar show up;   3. Press âmoreâ at bottom menu, then choose âRemove passcodeâ option;   5. Press the âOKâ button in confirm dialog;   6. Now Photo Gallery Lock will NOT ask you for a password when you open it;å Forget Password   1. Uninstall âPhoto Gallery Lockâ and install it again;   2. All protected media would not be lost;â Capture picture located in Photo Gallery Lock   1. Open Photo Gallery Lock;   2. Press âCameraâ option at the top and right of screen;   3. Take any pictures you want;   4. These pictures will be kept only in Photo Gallery Lock;This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.
